# bcfpgr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version of bcfpgr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/bcfpgr")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(bcfpgr)
## basic example code
```
